ygData.subject: Re: Topaz, and minor illus
ygData.msgSnippet: i am Almost certain that jade can be bought in Erudin and Qeynos , being from that part of the world, but I think every gem can be bought in highhold too, but
ygData.messageBody:
i am Almost certain that jade can be bought in Erudin and Qeynos , being
from that part of the world, but I think every gem can be bought in highhold
too, but I can't remember seeing topaz, but it is on my list of gems for
jewelcraft...are you sure it didn't work...or did you have a stack or
something..cuz I would hate to waste money and have it fail, or never even
try it fearing loosingit all when it does work.

Also I noticed that gems get quite expensive..and remember hearing that if u
switch to electrum to practice jewelcraft, it is more cost effective, does
anyone know how much mopre difficult it is to work with ..like which gem to
work with electrum after doing jade with silver?

On a seprate note , what other mailing list/boards are there for enchanters,
jewelcrafting, cuz I like to be caught up on all the latest stuff.

Tildin
a.k.a. Mark Prescott
Enchanter Extraordinaire
Proprieter of Tildin's Ore Emporium
Tunare Server

were
